-I don't understand why she brought him to school at night but that's when kid put the pieces together and decided to step up his game and alpha fucked Sis. He was like "Pamper me no more, sis. Imma be a good adult and'll make you happy on my own." It definitely wasn't quite what Sis wanted so she tried to scare him that she'll jump off the rooftop, to which kid fell for and lost his shortlived alpha mode. He barely stop her from jumping off but as he was about to fall off himself he was like: "Nah, I wanna be alpha, I can make my own way out of here" So he took a leap instead of taking Sis's helping hand. The story ended with Kid's expulsion and them being separated for some long time... only to end up being actual Step siblings lol. Kid's dad happens to marry Sis's mom so they living together now.  Honestly, I don't read a lot of yandere but this one's got a pretty decent plot, and art too.

I surprisingly find this one quite amazing of a read. Story's about this Kid (he's 18yo though) who has nothing much going on in his life except for his adoration for the lady next door (let's just call her Sis). Everything changed when he got injured from that bra stealing incident. Sis decides to look after him for a while as an apology for surprising him that caused his fall. Anyway, turns out that she also likes him. From here it's tons of pampering and sex. So what's up with the yandere mode? Apparently, these two actually met back when they were a lot younger. Back then, kid recently lost his mom and Sis's parents were workaholics. Sis found the kid as a way for her to feel "needed by/important to someone". Sadly, they eventually got separated from each other when kid the "fell from monkey bar accident" happened followed by Sis's parents' divorce. Back to the present, Sis has never changed from that "wanting to be needed by Kid" so yandere mode on for her. -
Art has improved a lol, let's hope this one get translated in the future
